title: Flat ₹200 OFF on First Order
description: New users get ₹200 instant discount on a minimum purchase of ₹999 on Myntra.

title: Up to 80% OFF + Extra 10% OFF on Electronics
description: Grab massive discounts on electronics during the Flipkart Big Saving Days. Additional 10% off with ICICI Cards.

title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on All Pizzas
description: Use this Domino's offer to get one free pizza on every purchase of a medium or large pizza.

title: ₹100 Cashback on Mobile Recharge
description: Recharge any prepaid mobile with a minimum of ₹249 and get ₹100 cashback via Paytm Wallet.

title: Flat ₹150 OFF on Medicines
description: Get ₹150 off on your first order of ₹799 or more from PharmEasy.

title: 25% OFF on Beauty & Personal Care
description: Limited-time offer on Nykaa - flat 25% off on top brands like L'Oreal, Lakmé & more.

title: Free 1-Month Subscription
description: Get a free 1-month Amazon Prime membership for new users with this exclusive link.

title: ₹250 Cashback on Booking 2 Movie Tickets
description: Book 2 movie tickets on BookMyShow and get ₹250 cashback using RBL credit cards.

title: 10% OFF on Groceries via Blinkit
description: Use this coupon to get 10% off on your next grocery order from Blinkit. No minimum order.

title: ₹500 OFF on Domestic Flights
description: SpiceJet offers ₹500 off on domestic flight bookings via the app. Use this limited-time promo.
